ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.models

Class ApplicationStateModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.models.ApplicationStateModel

  • public class ApplicationStateModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a singleton to contain data available to all activities. The code for setting up a singleton structure was borrowed from http://www.javaworld.com/article/2073352/core-java/simply-singleton.html
    Version:
    1 (current version number of program)
    Author:
    Cole Fudge

      • loadComments

        public void loadComments()
        A method for loading the list of head comments(i.e. commentList) from file. The commentList is changed in place, i.e. the reference is not changed, in order to avoid conflicting references.
        Parameters:
        void, - no arguments
        See Also:
        commentList

      • sort

        public java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> sort(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> list,
                                     java.util.Comparator<CommentModel> cmp)
        Selection sort algorithm to sort an array of comments by a given comparator
        Parameters:
        list - - array of CommentModels to sort
        cmp - - comparator to compare CommentModels when sorting
        Returns:
        the sorted array of head comments

      • pictureSort

        public java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> pictureSort(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> list,
                                            java.util.Comparator<CommentModel> cmp)
        Separates given array into two arrays with one containing comments with pictures, and the other without. Sorts each array by given comparator, then combines them.
        Parameters:
        list - - the array of CommentModels to sort
        cmp - - the comparator to compare CommentModels when sorting
        Returns:
        the sorted array of head comments

      • sort2

        public java.util.ArrayList<SubCommentModel> sort2(java.util.ArrayList<SubCommentModel> list,
                                         java.util.Comparator<CommentModel> cmp)
        Separates given array into two arrays with one containing comments with pictures, and the other without. Sorts each array by given comparator, then combines them.
        Parameters:
        list - - the array of SubCommentModels to sort.
        cmp - - the comparator to compare SubCommentModels when sorting.
        Returns:
        the sorted array of SubCommentModels.
